name: CPR without AED
description: Standard CPR when AED is not available
warning: Continue CPR until help arrives. Do not stop.
emergency_notes: Hands-only CPR is acceptable if uncomfortable with rescue breaths
Continue until paramedics arrive or victim recovers

steps.title: Check Responsiveness
steps.voice_prompt: Check if the person responds. Tap shoulders and shout.

steps.title: Call 911
steps.voice_prompt: Call nine one one immediately. State that person is unresponsive and not breathing.

steps.title: Position and Start Compressions
steps.voice_prompt: Start chest compressions. Push hard and fast in the center of the chest.

steps.title: Option: Add Rescue Breaths
detailed_instructions: Or continue compressions only if uncomfortable
steps.voice_prompt: After 30 compressions, you can give 2 rescue breaths. Or continue hands-only CPR.

steps.title: Continue Until Help Arrives
detailed_instructions: Switch with another person if available
Or victim shows signs of life
steps.voice_prompt: Continue CPR without stopping until paramedics arrive or the person recovers.
steps.critical_warning: Every compression counts - do not give up
